Breitbart’s Lee Stranahan and Michael Patrick Leahy will report on the latest information in our investigation of the story of the horrific rape of a 5-year-old girl by three Muslim migrant boys in Twin Falls, Idaho.

On the Wednesday edition of Breitbart News Daily, on SiriusXM Patriot Channel 125 from 6AM to 9AM Eastern, Breitbart London Editor Raheem Kassam and Breitbart Washington Political Editor Matt Boyle will co-host.

SiriusXM Vice President for news and talk Dave Gorab called the show “the conservative news show of record.”

Follow Breitbart News on Twitter for live updates during the show.
Live from London, Rome, and Jerusalem, Breitbart correspondents will provide updates on the latest international news.
We’ll also hear from Breitbart Jerusalem Editor Aaron Klein on the revelations in George Soros’ hacked emails.
Breitbart News Daily is the first live, conservative radio enterprise to air seven days a week.
Special guests include Frank Gaffney of the Center for Security Policy.
